# description

**Instance Property**

A string containing the real class name and the id of the receiver as a hexadecimal number.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a Proxy Class or Object

- **class()**: Returns `self` (the class object).
- **debugDescription**
